page.title: 17ROADE VILLAGE
page.content: ROADE IS QUITE A BIT BIGGER THAN THE OTHER VILLAGES IN THE AREA.THERE ARE ABOUT 900 HOUSES. THERE ARE TWO HOUSING ESTATES WHICH WERE BUILT IN THE 1960-1970 PERIOD. THERE ARE SOME OLD STONE HOUSES IN HARTWELL ROAD,BRETTS LANE AND THE HIGH STREET. ROADE IS DIFFERENT TO MOST VILLAGES BECAUSE IT HAS A BIG FACTORY. ABOUT HALF OF OUR PARENTS WORK THERE. SOME PEOPLE COME HERE FROM OTHER VILLAGES OR NORTHAMPTON. IT HAS QUITE A FEW SHOPS BUT THEY ARE NOT TOGETHER,THEY ARE SPREAD ALL OVER THE VILLAGE. ( BY JOANNE BROWN AGED 10 )
